Instructions: Use the buttons in the top right to switch the input.
Result is displayed in the console.
Algorithm: Go through every possibility until one is correct.
This is not the best solutions, we could just compute it by using the fact that the correct starting time is a factor of the size of each disk (delta their starting position).
This propertu is partly used for part 1 and 2 of the puzzle. Bigger disks are locked in place, and each iteration time is incremented by the factor of the sizes of the locked disks rather than by 1.
